tag_list: marketing, ziplocal, advertising, internet, online, canpages
overview:
Brandon Budz was born April 26, 1982 in Toronto, Ontario and is an experienced Canadian businessman with a strong marketing background in both online Internet & offline print advertising. Brandon has a wealth of experience in both the on-line and off-line media sectors; over the years he has had great success increasing sales & overall profits of various companies, primarily through increased online web traffic and company branding.

Brandon worked as a Online Marketing Analyst at ZipLocal Inc. a rapidly growing online business directory & localized search engine (in Canada & the US).

Currently Brandon is a Junior Project Manager for Canpages Inc. dealing specifically with their Search Engine Optimization and Online Marketing Strategies.
